rev.comment: This image use does not comply with [[WP:NFCC]] #10c and MUST be removed until it does. Thank you. See [[WP:FIXNF]] and [[WP:10CR]]

==Athletics==
==Athletics==
{{main|Western Illinois Leathernecks}}
{{main|Western Illinois Leathernecks}}
â
[[Image:WesternIllinoisLeathernecks.png|right|thumb]]
 
Inspired by the surrounding âvast golden prairie strewn with purple coneflowers,â Western Illinois University adopted purple and gold as its official colors in 1902. WIU is the only non-military institution in the nation with permission from the [[Department of the Navy]] to use the United States Marine Corps Official seal and mascot, the [[Bulldog]]. Colonel Rock, or Rocky, is the University mascot representing âThe Fighting Leathernecksâ for all male sports teams. Rocky was named after [[Ray Hanson|Ray "Rock" Hanson]], a former WIU athletic director and former [[United States Marine Corps|Marine]]. Beginning in the Fall of 2009 the men's and women's teams will be unified under the Leathernecks name. Previously, the women's teams and athletes at the school were known as Westerwinds.
